desc: The U-Scribe Jig is designed to make scribing simpler, easier and improve consistancy, It's as simple as Attach, slide, scribe, cut and fit. Designed to solve the problem of working alone, struggling with long and difficult to hold fillers and fascias by acting as your 3rd Hand #uscribejig #3rdhand #caulkkiller

layout.text: The ultimate installation accessory for installing kitchens & bedrooms
